entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers or drizzle. Low minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers or drizzle this evening. Fog patches dissipating early this evening. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 early this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill near minus 9. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 8 except minus 13 in low lying areas.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 8 except minus 13 in low lying areas. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 10 February 2023
